snippet.title: Million Onion Hotel Release Trailer (iOS, Android, 2016)
snippet.description:
Play MILLION ONION HOTEL on iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/million-onion-hotel/id1225091207

Play MILLION ONION HOTEL on Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.oniongames.hotel

The weirdest puzzle game you could imagine has finally been unleashed on the mobile phones! Enjoy a plethora of performing pixel patrons! Indulge in an onslaught of bizarre aural ecstasy!

A long, long time ago, there was a tiny country between that country over there, and this country over here. In that country was a strange hotel. This hotel’s specialty was "magical onion soup".

They say many famous and great people came to taste this soup, though apparently not one of them thought to describe the flavor to anyone else. Maybe it’s because the soup had a hidden power. Yes... a secret power.

One night, some esteemed guests found themselves suddenly sucked into a far- off galaxy! Maybe that is because they... drank too much of the magical onion soup?

What does fate have in store for the hotel’s mysterious guests? Don’t miss this unique puzzle/pixel tapestry and the unique tale its characters weave!

Find out in this bizarre puzzle game on iOS and Android, from Tokyo indie developer Onion Games!

Click here to find out more about MILLION ONION HOTEL: http://oniongames.jp/milliononionhotel/index.html

Click here to find out more about Onion Games: http://oniongames.jp/
